ModMetaData.name: Mass Info for World View Caravan with Shuttle 世界地图穿梭机重量信息显示
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mass Info for World View Caravan with Shuttle 世界地图穿梭机重量信息显示[/h1]
In World View, we can only see the shuttle's weight usage and capacity information when the shuttle cannot take off due to weight issues. This mod adds a line in the caravan's inspect panel to display the current weight usage and capacity information of the shuttle in the caravan.
在世界视图中，我们只能在穿梭机因为重量问题无法起飞时，才能知道穿梭机当前重量使用情况和容量信息。 本模组在远行队的面板信息中添加了一行，显示当前远行队穿梭机的重量使用情况和容量信息。
